faq.title: FAQ
faq.subtitle: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitleDesc: Everything you need to know about Nokta

whatIsNokta.question: What is Nokta One, exactly?
whatIsNokta.answer:
Nokta One is a body and nervous system reset technology. In seconds, it identifies when your body is "off" and offers a simple micro-action to return to a functional, clear, and high-performing state.

It's not meditation, therapy, or medical monitoring.
It's an immediate adjustment tool, usable in real life.

whenUseful.question: When is Nokta One useful?
whenUseful.answer:
Nokta One is designed for moments when you think:

‚Ä¢ "I don't feel right, but I don't know why"
‚Ä¢ "I'm tense for no clear reason"
‚Ä¢ "I can't focus"
‚Ä¢ "My body is tired, but my mind wants to keep going"
‚Ä¢ "I'm not at my best"

These moments happen before important meetings, after mental overload, between demanding tasks, before sports or competition, at the end of the day when your body gives up, or in the morning when energy isn't there.

Nokta One is designed for these daily micro-imbalances, not medical situations.

whyOffButOk.question: Why do I sometimes feel "fine" but not function properly?
whyOffButOk.answer:
Because your body and nervous system can be desynchronized.

You can:
‚Ä¢ Have a good heart rate but feel oppressed
‚Ä¢ Be mentally calm but physically agitated
‚Ä¢ Be motivated but unable to get started

Nokta One is based on the principle that body sensation precedes mental performance.

differentFromOthers.question: How is Nokta One different from classic wellness apps?
differentFromOthers.answer:
Most apps ask you to:
‚Ä¢ Understand what you're feeling
‚Ä¢ Choose a practice
‚Ä¢ Commit to a long time

Nokta One does the opposite:
‚Ä¢ It starts from the body signal, not your analysis
‚Ä¢ It reduces choice to one single action
‚Ä¢ It acts in less than 30 seconds

Less thinking, less friction, more impact.

analyzeEmotions.question: Does Nokta One "analyze" my emotions?
analyzeEmotions.answer:
Nokta One doesn't judge you and makes no diagnosis.

It only observes neutral body indicators (posture, tension, visible micro-signals) to estimate a global functional state.

The goal isn't to tell you "what you're feeling", but to detect when your body isn't aligned with what you want to do.

replaceProfessional.question: Does Nokta One replace a healthcare professional?
replaceProfessional.answer:
No.

Nokta One is a daily regulation tool, not a medical device. It treats no pathology, makes no therapeutic promises, and never replaces medical advice.

It's designed for functional, active, demanding people who want to stay high-performing without waiting to feel bad.

whyBodyNotMind.question: Why act on the body rather than the mind?
whyBodyNotMind.answer:
Because in most cases:
‚Ä¢ The mind follows the body
‚Ä¢ Clarity comes after regulation
‚Ä¢ Performance returns when the nervous system is stable

A well-targeted physical micro-action can produce an immediate effect, where a mental approach takes more time.

howOften.question: How often should I use Nokta One?
howOften.answer:
Nokta One imposes no rhythm.

Some use it:
‚Ä¢ 1-2 times a day as a quick check
‚Ä¢ Before a key moment
‚Ä¢ Only when "something feels off"

The goal isn't dependence, but autonomy.

forAthletesOnly.question: O Nokta One √© apenas para atletas ou empreendedores?
forAthletesOnly.answer:
N√£o, mas √© particularmente √∫til para pessoas que buscam:
‚Ä¢ Clareza
‚Ä¢ Consist√™ncia
‚Ä¢ Desempenho sustent√°vel

O lan√ßamento √© direcionado ao mercado dos EUA, muito voltado para desempenho, otimiza√ß√£o e efici√™ncia, mas o Nokta One √© projetado para todas as culturas, idades e estilos de vida.

dontBelieveBreathing.question: Funciona mesmo se eu n√£o acreditar em "t√©cnicas de respira√ß√£o"?
dontBelieveBreathing.answer:
Sim, porque o Nokta One n√£o depende de cren√ßas.

As micro-a√ß√µes propostas s√£o:
‚Ä¢ Simples
‚Ä¢ Curtas
‚Ä¢ Baseadas em mecanismos fisiol√≥gicos conhecidos

Voc√™ n√£o precisa "acreditar" em nada.
Voc√™ faz a a√ß√£o, observa o efeito.

whySoShort.question: Por que a√ß√µes t√£o curtas?
whySoShort.answer:
Porque o sistema nervoso muitas vezes responde melhor a:
‚Ä¢ Sinais claros
‚Ä¢ Est√≠mulos breves
‚Ä¢ Interrup√ß√µes bruscas do estado anterior

30 segundos bem direcionados podem ser mais eficazes do que 10 minutos mal aproveitados.

dataPrivacy.question: O Nokta One coleta dados pessoais sens√≠veis?
dataPrivacy.answer:
O Nokta One aplica uma l√≥gica de m√°xima sobriedade de dados.

‚Ä¢ Sem explora√ß√£o m√©dica
‚Ä¢ Sem revenda de dados
‚Ä¢ Sem interpreta√ß√£o invasiva

As informa√ß√µes servem apenas para melhorar a experi√™ncia do usu√°rio.

allLanguages.question: O Nokta One funciona em todas as l√≠nguas?
allLanguages.answer:
Sim.
O Nokta One √© lan√ßado em 12 idiomas, com aten√ß√£o especial √† sensa√ß√£o universal, n√£o ao vocabul√°rio complexo.

O corpo fala a mesma l√≠ngua em todos os lugares.

whoIsItFor.question: Para quem √© realmente o Nokta One?
whoIsItFor.answer:
Para aqueles que:
‚Ä¢ Querem se manter funcionais sem superanalisar
‚Ä¢ Sentem quando algo "escorrega" mas n√£o querem dramatizar
‚Ä¢ Buscam uma ferramenta simples, r√°pida e discreta
‚Ä¢ Querem performar sem se exaurir

O Nokta One n√£o est√° aqui para mudar voc√™.
Est√° aqui para ajudar voc√™ a voltar ao seu estado normal.

whyNow.question: Por que agora?
whyNow.answer:
Porque o mundo se move r√°pido, a press√£o √© real e muitas pessoas funcionam em modo degradado sem perceber.

O Nokta One responde a uma necessidade moderna:
Recalibrar rapidamente, sem parar de viver.
